catch:
(:action catch_or_trade_vulpix
    :parameters (?p - player ?v - vulpix)
    :precondition (and (in_wild ?v))
    :effect (and (caught ?v) (owned ?v) (not (in_wild ?v)))
)

(:action find_stone
    :parameters (?p - player ?s - stone ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (not (in_bag ?s)))
    :effect (and (in_bag ?s) (not (at ?s ?loc)))
)

(:action select_bag
    :parameters (?p - player ?b - bag)
    :precondition (and (owned ?p) (have_bag ?b))
    :effect (and (bag_selected ?b))
)
wait:
(:action wait_for_evolution
    :parameters (?v - vulpix)
    :precondition (and (evolving ?v))
    :effect (and (evolved ?v) (not (evolving ?v)))
)
```

These actions capture the intent and logic of each step required to evolve a Vulpix in Pokémon, based on the provided descriptions and entity states.
